needsDescriptionMood.english: If you don't keep your colonists happy, they'll start being defiant and might stop following your orders.
needsDescriptionMood.german: Wenn du deine Siedler nicht bei Laune hälst, werden sie aufmüpfig und gehorchen dir eventuell nicht mehr.
needsDescriptionMood.french: Si vous ne gardez pas vos colons heureux, ils commenceront à devenir provocateurs et pourraient arrêter de suivre vos ordres
needsDescriptionMood.spanish: Si no mantienes a tus colonos felices, se volverán rebeldes y puede que dejen de seguir tus órdenes.
needsDescriptionMood.turkish: Kolonicileri mutlu tutmazsan, sorun çıkarmaya başlayacaklar, ve emirlerini dinlemeyecekler
needsDescriptionMood.portuguese: Se você não mantiver seus colonos felizes, eles começarão a ser desafiadores e poderão parar de seguir seus pedidos.
needsDescriptionMood.dutch: Als je je kolonisten niet blij houdt, beginnen ze uitdagend te worden en volgen ze jouw orders misschien niet meer

needsDescriptionFriendships.english: This need hasn't been fully included into the game yet.
needsDescriptionFriendships.german: Dieses Bedürfnis ist noch nicht gänzlich in das Spiel integriert worden.
needsDescriptionFriendships.french: Ce besoin n'est pas encore entièrement inclus dans le jeu.
needsDescriptionFriendships.spanish: Esta necesidad todavía no ha sido incluída al completo en el juego.
needsDescriptionFriendships.turkish: Bu ihtiyaç tam olarak henüz oyuna dahil edilmedi.
needsDescriptionFriendships.portuguese: Esta necessidade ainda não foi totalmente incluída no jogo.
needsDescriptionFriendships.dutch: Deze benodigheid zit nog niet helemaal in het spel

needsDescriptionHunger.english: Gather apples or plant crops to take care of food.
needsDescriptionHunger.german: Sammle Äpfel oder baue Pflanzen an, um den Nahrungsvorrat hoch zu halten.
needsDescriptionHunger.french: Récolter des pommes ou planter des cultures consomment de la nourriture
needsDescriptionHunger.spanish: Recoge manzanas o planta cultivos para cuidar la alimentación.
needsDescriptionHunger.turkish: Yemek için ya elma topla ya da sebze ek
needsDescriptionHunger.portuguese: Reúna maçãs ou plante colheitas para cuidar dos alimentos.
needsDescriptionHunger.dutch: Verzamel wat Appels of Gewassen om voor eten te zorgen

needsDescriptionStamina.english: Give your colonist a break every once in a while so they can recover.
needsDescriptionStamina.german: Ab und an müssen sich deine fleißigen Siedler ausruhen.
needsDescriptionStamina.french: Donner à vos colons des pauses pour qu'ils se reposent
needsDescriptionStamina.spanish: Permite a tu colono descansar para que pueda reponerse.
needsDescriptionStamina.turkish: Arada bir kolonicileri kendi hallerine bırak ki rahatlayabilsinler.
needsDescriptionStamina.portuguese: Dê ao seu colono uma pausa de vez em quando para que ele possa se recuperar.
needsDescriptionStamina.dutch: Om de zoveel tijd hebben jouw kolonisten een pauze nodig zodat ze bij kunnen komen

needsDescriptionHealth.english: Let your colonists sleep and or give them healing potions to increase their health.
needsDescriptionHealth.german: Schicke deine Kolonisten zum Schlafen oder gib ihnen Heiltränke, um ihre Gesundheit zu erhöhen.
needsDescriptionHealth.french: Laisser vos colons dormir ou donner leur des potions de soin pour améliorer leur santé
needsDescriptionHealth.spanish: Permite a tus colonos dormir o dales pociones de salud para incrementar su salud.
needsDescriptionHealth.turkish: Sağlıklarını geri kazanabilmeleri için kolonicileri uykuya gönderebilirsin ya da sağlık iksiri verebilirsin.
needsDescriptionHealth.portuguese: Deixe seus colonos dormirem ou dar-lhes poções de cura para aumentar sua saúde.
needsDescriptionHealth.dutch: Laat je kolonisten slapen en of geef ze genezende drankjes om hun gezondheid omhoog te halen

promototions_Desc.english: Once your colonists gather enough experience in their profession, you can promote them to unlock new skills
promototions_Desc.german: Sobald deine Kolonisten genug Erfahrung in ihrerem Beruf haben, kannst du sie befördern um neue Fähigkeiten freizuschalten
promototions_Desc.french: Une fois que vos colons ont assez d'expérience dans leur métier, vous pouvez les promouvoir pour débloquer de nouvelles compétences
promototions_Desc.spanish: Una vez tu colono ha conseguido la experiencia necesaria en su profesión, puedes ascenderle para desbloquear nuevas habilidades.
promototions_Desc.turkish: Mesleklerinde yeteri kadar tecrübe edindikten sonra kolonicileri terfi ettirebilirsin.
promototions_Desc.portuguese: Uma vez que seus colonos acumulem experiência suficiente em sua profissão, você pode promovê-los para desbloquear novas habilidades.
promototions_Desc.dutch: Wanneer jouw kolonisten genoeg ervaring hebben in hun beroep, kan je ze promoveren om nieuwe vaardigheden vrij te spelen

seasonsDescription.english: This bar shows how much time is left until the seasons change.
seasonsDescription.german: Die Leiste zeigt an, wie viel Zeit noch übrig ist bis die Jahreszeit wechselt.
seasonsDescription.french: Cette barre affiche combien de temps il reste avant que la saison change
seasonsDescription.spanish: Esta barra muestra cuánto tiempo queda hasta que la estación cambie.
seasonsDescription.turkish: Mevsim değişimine ne kadar süre kaldığını gösterir.
seasonsDescription.portuguese: Esta barra mostra quanto tempo resta até as Temporadas mudarem.
seasonsDescription.dutch: Deze balk laat zien hoeveel tijd over is todat de seizoenen veranderen

wishPointsTip_Desc.english: Every fulfilled wish makes your colonist more satisfied with life.
wishPointsTip_Desc.german: Jeder erfüllte Wunsch macht deinen Kolonisten zufriedener mit seinem Leben.
wishPointsTip_Desc.french: Chaque vœu complété rend le colon plus satisfait de sa vie
wishPointsTip_Desc.spanish: Cada deseo cumplido hace que tu colono se sienta más satisfecho con su vida.
wishPointsTip_Desc.turkish: Tamamlanan her istek kolonicilerin hayattan daha fazla keyif almasını sağlar.
wishPointsTip_Desc.portuguese: Todo desejo realizado deixa seu colono mais satisfeito com a vida.
wishPointsTip_Desc.dutch: Elke wens die je uit laat komen maakt jouw kolonisten meer tevreden met hun leven

wishDenyTip_Desc.english: You can tell your colonists that you're not going to fulfill this wish. They'll be annoyed, but they will choose a different one.
wishDenyTip_Desc.german: Du kannst deinen Kolonisten sagen, dass du diesen Wunsch nicht erfüllen wirst. Sie werden sauer sein, aber letztendlich werden sie sich einen anderen ausdenken.
wishDenyTip_Desc.french: Vous pouvez dire à vos colons que vous ne compléterez pas ce vœu. Il sera supprimé, mais ils vont en choisir un autre.
wishDenyTip_Desc.spanish: Puedes decirle a tus colonos que no podrás hacer realidad su deseo. Se decepcionarán, pero escogerán otro.
wishDenyTip_Desc.turkish: Kolonicilerine isteklerinin yerine gelmeyeceğini söyleyebilirsin. Rahatsızlık duyacaklar ama yeni bir istek seçecekler.
wishDenyTip_Desc.portuguese: Você pode dizer ao seu colono que você não vai cumprir esse desejo. Ele ficará aborrecido, mas escolherá outro diferente.
wishDenyTip_Desc.dutch: Je kan je kolonist vertellen dat je niet zijn wens uit laat komen. Hij wordt wel geïriteerd, maar dan kiest hij een andere

satisfactionPoints_Desc.english: Fulfill your colonists' wishes and they will be satisfied with life. When the bar is full they gets one lifetime satisfaction point.
satisfactionPoints_Desc.german: Erfülle die Wünsche deiner Kolonisten und sie wird mit ihrem Leben zufrieden sein. Wenn die Leiste voll ist, bekommen sie einen Lebenszufriedenheitspunkt.
satisfactionPoints_Desc.french: Complétez les vœux de vos colons et ils seront satisfaits de leur vie. Lorsque la barre est remplie, ils obtiennent un point de satisfaction de vie.
satisfactionPoints_Desc.spanish: Completa los deseos de tus colonos y estarán satisfecho con su vida. Cuando la barra se llene al máximo obtendrán un punto de satisfacción de vida.
satisfactionPoints_Desc.turkish: Kolonicilerin isteklerini yerine getirirsen hayatlarından daha fazla zevk alacak. Seviye tamamlandığında bir memnuniyet puanı kazanacaklar.
satisfactionPoints_Desc.portuguese: Cumpra os desejos do seu colono e ele ficará satisfeito com a vida. Quando a barra está cheia, ele recebe um ponto de satisfação vitalício.
satisfactionPoints_Desc.dutch: Laat een wens van jouw kolonist uitkomen en dan zal hij tevreden zijn met het leven. Wanneer de balk vol is krijgt krijgt hij een levenslag tevredenheid punt.

satisfactionLevel_Desc.english: Represents the total lifetime satisfaction of your colonist.
satisfactionLevel_Desc.german: Zeigt die gesamte Lebenszufriedenheit deines Kolonisten an.
satisfactionLevel_Desc.french: Représente la satisfaction de vie totale de votre colon
satisfactionLevel_Desc.spanish: Representa la satisfacción de por vida del colono.
satisfactionLevel_Desc.turkish: Kolonicinizin toplam ömür boyu memnuniyetini temsil eder.
satisfactionLevel_Desc.portuguese: Representa a satisfação total da vida de seu colono.
satisfactionLevel_Desc.dutch: Geeft de totale tevredenheid van jouw kolonisten weer in hun hele leven

promotions_Desc.english: Once your colonists have gathered enough Experience, you can promote them to unlock new skills.
promotions_Desc.german: Sobald deine Kolonisten genug Erfahrung gesammelt haben, kannst du sie befördern um neue Fähigkeiten freizuschalten.
promotions_Desc.french: Une fois que votre colon a assez d'expériences, vous pouvez le promouvoir pour débloquer de nouvelles compétences.
promotions_Desc.spanish: Una vez el colono ha conseguido experiencia suficiente, puedes ascenderle para desbloquear nuevas habilidades.
promotions_Desc.turkish: Koloniciniz yeteri kadar tecrübe kazandıktan sonra, onu terfi ettirerek yeni beceriler kazanmasını sağlayabilirsiniz.
promotions_Desc.portuguese: Uma vez que seu colono tenha acumulado experiência suficiente, você pode promovê-lo para desbloquear novas habilidades.
promotions_Desc.dutch: Wanneer jouw kolonisten genoeg ervaring heeft gekregen, kan je hem promoveren om nieuwe vaardigheden te leren.

onlyMineDesignatedRocksOres.spanish: Solo minar las piedras o los minerales seleccionados.

designationTooltip_Title.german: Wähle spezifische Ressourcen zum Sammeln aus
designationTooltip_Title.french: Sélectionner les ressources spécifiques à récolter
designationTooltip_Title.spanish: Selecciona los recursos específicos que recolectar
designationTooltip_Title.dutch: Selecteer specifieke grondstoffen om te verzamelen

designationTooltip_Desc.english: With the designation tool you can restrict resource gathering to the objects you have marked with the tool. The colonists are only going to work on designated objects automatically.
designationTooltip_Desc.german: Mit dem Ressourcenwerkzeug kannst du das Sammeln von Ressourcen auf markierte Objekte beschränken. Die Kolonisten werden automatisch nur an markierten Objekten arbeiten.
designationTooltip_Desc.french: Avec l'outil désigné vous pouvez restreindre les ressources aux objets que vous avez marqué avec l'outil. Les colons vont travailler automatiquement sur les objets désignés.
designationTooltip_Desc.spanish: Con la herramienta de seleccionado puedes restringir los recursos que se recolectarán a aquellos que hayas marcado. Los colonos trabajaran en los objetos seleccionados automáticamente.
designationTooltip_Desc.turkish: Seçim aracıyla kaynak toplanmasını sadece seçilen objelerde yapılmasını sağlayabilirsiniz. Böylece koloniciler sadece bu objelerde çalışır
designationTooltip_Desc.portuguese: Com a ferramenta de designação, você pode restringir a coleta de recursos aos objetos marcados com a ferramenta. Os colonos só vão trabalhar em objetos designados automaticamente.
designationTooltip_Desc.dutch: Met het markeer gereedschap kan je het verbieden om grondstoffen te verzamelen aan de objecten die je hebt geselecteerd met het gereedschap. De Kolonisten gaan alleen automatisch werken aan geselecteerde objecten

combatModeTooltip_Desc.english: In combat mode, your colonists will put on their combat equipment and stop working on their jobs, relaxing, or talking with others. This allows you to control them better in battle.
combatModeTooltip_Desc.french: En mode combat, vos colons metteront leur équipement de combat et cesseront de travailler, de se détendre ou de parler entre eux. Cela vous permet de mieux les contrôler au combat.

gameInfoAndStats.french: Info de la Partie et Statistiques

interactionChainIconDesc.english:
Click to Cancel.
Click %keyBinding% to Chain Commands.
interactionChainIconDesc.german:
Klicken zum Abbrechen
%keyBinding% klicken um mehrere Kommandos einzureihen
interactionChainIconDesc.french:
Cliquez pour Annuler.
Cliquez sur %keyBinding% pour ajouter à la Chaîne de Commandes.
interactionChainIconDesc.spanish:
Clic para cancelar. 
Clic %keyBinding% para encadenar comandos.
interactionChainIconDesc.turkish:
İptal için tıklayın.
%keyBinding% ile zincirleme emir verebilirsiniz.
interactionChainIconDesc.portuguese:
Clique para Cancelar.
Clique em %keyBinding% para Múltiplos Comandos.
interactionChainIconDesc.dutch:
Klik om te Annuleren.
%KeyBinding% klikken om commandos aan elkaar te koppelen

immigration_status_maxColonists.english: Your colony has reached its maximum size. Congratulations! Be sure to post a picture in the forums!
immigration_status_maxColonists.german: Deine Kolonie hat ihre maximale Größe erreicht. Glückwunsch. Poste einen Screenshot in unser Forum!
immigration_status_maxColonists.french: Votre colonie a atteint sa taille maximale. Félicitations ! Postez une image sur le forum !
immigration_status_maxColonists.spanish: Tu colonia ha llegado al tamaño máximo. ¡Felicidades! ¡Asegúrate de postear una imagen en el foro!
immigration_status_maxColonists.turkish: Koloniniz azami nüfusa ulaştı. Tebrikler! Forumda resim paylaşmayı unutmayın!
immigration_status_maxColonists.portuguese: Sua colônia atingiu seu tamanho máximo. Parabéns! Certifique-se de postar uma foto nos fóruns!
immigration_status_maxColonists.dutch: Jouw kolonie heeft zijn maximale grootte behaald. Gefeliciteerd! Zorg ervoor dat je een foto op de forums zet!

immigration_status_noBonfire.english: No Bonfire is burning. Migrants are not able to find the colony.
immigration_status_noBonfire.german: Kein Leuchtfeuer brennt. Migranten können die Kolonie nicht finden.
immigration_status_noBonfire.french: Aucun Grand Feu ne brûle. Les migrants ne trouveront pas votre colonie
immigration_status_noBonfire.spanish: La almenara no está ardiendo. Los migrantes no pueden encontrar la colonia.
immigration_status_noBonfire.turkish: Uyarı ateşi yanmıyor. Göçmenler koloniyi bulamayacak
immigration_status_noBonfire.portuguese: Nenhuma fogueira está queimando. Os migrantes não conseguem encontrar a colônia.
immigration_status_noBonfire.dutch: Er is geen Baken aan. Migranten kunnen de kolonie niet vinden

immigration_status_expectationsNotMet.english: Your colonists' expectations are not met. No migrants are going to join this colony.
immigration_status_expectationsNotMet.german: Die Erwartungen deiner Kolonisten sind nicht erfüllt. Keine Migranten werden dieser Kolonie beitreten.
immigration_status_expectationsNotMet.french: L'attente de vos colons n'a pas été atteinte. Aucun migrant ne rejoindra votre colonie
immigration_status_expectationsNotMet.spanish: Las expectativas de tus colonos no se cumplen. No llegarán migrantes a unirse a la colonia.
immigration_status_expectationsNotMet.turkish: Kolonicilerinizin istekleri karşılanmadı. Hiçbir göçmen koloninize katılmayacak
immigration_status_expectationsNotMet.portuguese: As expectativas dos seus colonos não são atendidas. Nenhum migrante vai se juntar a esta colônia.
immigration_status_expectationsNotMet.dutch: De verwachting van je kolonisten zijn niet behaald. Geen migranten gaan deze kolonie betreden

immigration_status_ok.english: All your colonists' expectations are met. Next chance for migrants in %time%.
immigration_status_ok.german: Alle Erwartungen deiner Kolonisten sind erfüllt. Nächste Chance for Migranten in %time%.
immigration_status_ok.french: Toutes les attentes de vos colons ont été atteintes. Les migrants arriveront dans %time%.
immigration_status_ok.spanish: Las expectativas de todos tus colonos se cumplen. Probabilidad de que aparezcan nuevos migrantes en %time%.
immigration_status_ok.turkish: Tüm kolonicilerinizin istekleri karşılandı. Yeni göçmen şansı için süre %time%.
immigration_status_ok.portuguese: Todas as expectativas de seus colonos são atendidas. Próxima oportunidade para os migrantes em %time%
immigration_status_ok.dutch: Alle verwachtingen van jouw kolonisten zijn behaald. De volgende kans op migranten is in &time&

colonistIsDumbNoExperience.english: Unfortunately, %firstName% is dumb and is not going to gain any experience in any job.
colonistIsDumbNoExperience.german: Leider ist %firstName% nicht der Hellste und wird keine Erfahrung sammeln.
colonistIsDumbNoExperience.french: Malheureusement, %firstName% est stupide et ne gagnera d'expérience dans aucun travail.
colonistIsDumbNoExperience.spanish: Desafortunadamente, %firstName% es tonto y no ganará nada de experiencia en ningún trabajo.
colonistIsDumbNoExperience.turkish: Ne yazık ki, %firstName% bir aptal ve çalıştığı işlerde tecrübe edinemeyecek.
colonistIsDumbNoExperience.portuguese: Infelizmente, %firstName% é burro e não vai ganhar experiência em nenhum trabalho.
colonistIsDumbNoExperience.dutch: Helaas, %firstName% is dom en zal geen ervaring opdoen in een baan

importantPossession_Desc.english:
%name% likes this thing a lot and does not want to give it up.

You can not use it to fulfill anyone else's wishes.
importantPossession_Desc.german:
%name% mag dieses Objekt sehr gern und will es nicht hergeben

Du kannst es nicht verwenden, um die Wünsche von anderen zu erfüllen.
importantPossession_Desc.french:
%name% aime beaucoup cette chose et ne veut pas y renoncer.

Vous ne pouvez pas l'utiliser pour satisfaire les souhaits de quelqu'un d'autre.
importantPossession_Desc.spanish:
%name% adora este objeto y no quiere dejarlo.

No puedes usarlo para llenar el deseo de otro colono.
importantPossession_Desc.portuguese:
%name% gosta muito dessa coisa e não quer desistir. 

Você não pode usá-la para satisfazer os desejos de outra pessoa.
importantPossession_Desc.turkish:
%name% bu şeyi çok seviyor ve ondan vazgeçmek istemiyor.

Onu bir başkasının dileğini yerine getirmek için kullanamazsın.
importantPossession_Desc.dutch:
%name% vindt dit ding erg leuk en hij wilt het niet opgeven.

Je kan het niet meer gebruiken om iemand anders zijn wens uit te laten komen

takeOwnershipOfStorageFurniture.english: Take Ownership of equipment storage furniture to assign equipment
takeOwnershipOfStorageFurniture.german: Nehme Besitz von einem Ausrüstungshalter, um Ausrüstung auswählen zu können
takeOwnershipOfStorageFurniture.french: Prendre possession du mobilier de stockage d'équipement pour attribuer l'équipement
takeOwnershipOfStorageFurniture.spanish: Toma posesión del almacén de equipo para asignarse equipaje

selectEquipmentInStorageFurniture.english: Select equipment in the storage furniture
selectEquipmentInStorageFurniture.french: Sélectionner l'équipement dans le meuble de stockage
selectEquipmentInStorageFurniture.spanish: Selecciona equipaje en el mueble de almacén

colonyIsSelling.english: Colony is Selling to the Trader
colonyIsSelling.french: La Colonie est en train de Vendre au Commerçant
colonyIsSelling.spanish: La colonia está vendiendo al comerciante

colonyIsBuying.english: Colony is Buying from the Trader
colonyIsBuying.french: La Colonie est en train d'Acheter au Commerçant
colonyIsBuying.spanish: La colonia está comprando al comerciante

sellItemsOfValue.english: Buying items with a value of %coins% coins
sellItemsOfValue.german: Verkauft Gegenstände mit einem Wert von %coins% Münzen
sellItemsOfValue.french: Vendre des objets d'une valeur de %coins% pièces
sellItemsOfValue.spanish: Comprando items con valor de %coins% monedas

buyItemsOfValue.english: Buying items with a value of %coins% coins
buyItemsOfValue.german: Kauft Gegenstände mit einem Wert von %coins% Münzen
buyItemsOfValue.french: Acheter des objets d'une valeur de %coins% pièces
buyItemsOfValue.spanish: Comprando items con un valor de %coins% monedas

colonyIsGainingCoins.english: The colony is gaining %coins% coins from this deal.
colonyIsGainingCoins.german: Die Kolonie erhält %coins% Münzen von diesem Handel.
colonyIsGainingCoins.french: La colonie reçoit %coins% pièces de cette transaction.
colonyIsGainingCoins.spanish: La colonia gana %coins% monedas de esta transacción.

colonyIsPayingCoins.english: The colony is paying %coins% coins for this deal.
colonyIsPayingCoins.german: Die Kolonie zahlt %coins% Münzen für diesen Handel.
colonyIsPayingCoins.french: La colonie paie %coins% pièces de cette transaction.
colonyIsPayingCoins.spanish: La colonia paga %coins% monedas de esta transacción.

colonyDoesNotHaveCoins.english: The colony does not have %coins% coins to pay for this deal.
colonyDoesNotHaveCoins.german: Die Kolonie hat keine %coins% Münzen um diesen Handel zu bezahlen.
colonyDoesNotHaveCoins.french: La colonie n'a pas %coins% pièces à payer pour cette transaction.
colonyDoesNotHaveCoins.spanish: La colonia no tiene %coins% monedas para pagar esta transacción
